item.description:
This class is for beginners!  I will start from ground zero with the assumption that most participants do not have Tai Chi experience.  We will be using the 18 Essential Form as our starting place, with lots of individual attention, and time for questions.

Just a note about the space.  Most people find it confusing the first time they arrive at Wadsworth Village.  It appears to be a residential area with a dead-end, cul-de-sac.  Please keep driving forward, and you will see the main building on your left.  Behind the main building are 6 more buildings.  Look for the middle building on the far side.  Enter the door on the road, and go down the steps to the Spiral Path studio.
item.how_to_find_us: This address will get you to the main Office Park. It looks like you have come to a dead-end. Keep going! Middle building on Far side.
item.name: Just for Beginners--Tai Chi Essentials
